SYN_BRONCH_5_1:
Indication: CF, RLL cavitary lesion.
Anesthesia: General, ETT.
Findings: RUL apical/posterior fusion. RLL superior segment purulence. Cavity visualized with mycetoma.
Procedures:
- BAL RLL superior segment (60cc in/20cc out).
- Forceps biopsy of intracavitary mass.
Complications: Moderate bleeding. Controlled with epi, iced saline, wedge.
Plan: PACU. Admit.
